altTitles.ja: サジちゃんの病み日記

altTitles.vi: Nhật ký đen tối của Sazi-chan

description.en: Sazi-chan has a girl she likes. Though her feelings are too pure for anyone to understand, it is definitely true love. Taking pictures, stealing, stabbing, assaulting, that too, is love.

In a videogame based on a fantasy world, their players are know as Onmir. Our protagonist, a notorious killer of other Onmirs, logs in one day as usual but in the split of a moment, the environment changes giving a weird feeling, suddenly he realises that he cannot log off and that if he were to die, he will die in the real world. A fall into tragedy starts...
description.es-la: En un Juego basado en un mundo de fantasía, dentro de este los jugadores son conocidos como Onmir. Nuestro protagonista un infame Asesino de Onmirs, se conecta como siempre lo había hecho, pero en un momento el ambiente cambia, una sensación extraña y junto a esto él se percatada que no puede salir del juego. Si muere en el juego, morirá en la vida real. Se inicia un descenso a la tragedia...

description.en: Sitting in a corner of the city is a seemingly normal shop called 'Time Photo Studio'. The shop owners, Cheng Xiaoshi and Lu Guang, can dive back in time through photos. One day, an uprising star in the Chinese opera world — Lin Kai — visited the studio and tasked Cheng Xiaoshi and Lu Guang to find a cassette tape from 10 years ago. They only have one photo, and one chance...
description.fr: Dans un coin de la ville se trouve une boutique, en apparence normale, nommée le "Time Photo Studio". Les propriétaires de la boutique, Cheng Xiaoshi et Lu Guang, peuvent voyager dans le temps au travers de photos. Un jour, une étoile montante de l'opéra chinois, Lin Kai, visite leur studio et leur demande de trouver un enregistrement datant d'il y a 10 ans. Ils n'ont qu'une seule photo et qu'une chance...
description.zh: 在城市的某个角落，有一家看似普通的小店——时光照相馆。店主程小时和陆光可以通过照片，进入过去的时空。有一天，戏曲界新锐林凯来到了照相馆，委托程小时与陆光，寻找一份10年前的影像。照片只有1张，机会只有1次……

title.en: Shinmai Ossan Boukensha, Saikyou Party ni Shinu hodo Kitaerarete Muteki ni Naru.

altTitles.ja: 新米オッサン冒険者、最強パーティに死ぬほど鍛えられて無敵になる。

altTitles.en: The Middle-Aged Newbie Adventurer, Trained to Death by the Strongest Party, Became Unbeatable

altTitles.zh: 大叔新人冒险者 被最强小队拼死锻炼后无敌了

altTitles.zh-hk: 大叔新人冒險者 被最強小隊拼死鍛煉后無敵了

altTitles.ko: 신참 아재 모험가, 최강 파티에서 죽을 정도로 단련해서 무적이 된다

description.en: It is common knowledge that it is best to become an adventurer when you are as young as possible, because the magical power that is the basis of an adventurer's strength will hardly grow if you don't train it while you are young. But this man, Rick Gladiator, who became an adventurer when he was over thirty years old, had the combat power of an S-rank adventurer, the highest rank in the world. In fact, Rick has lived an unimaginable life with the members of the legendary Orihalcon Fist, a party of the continent's strongest adventurers. From dragons to vampires, Rick's fighting prowess, trained by his literally "monster" mentors, allows him to defeat elite adventurers one after another who try to underestimate him.
description.ja: 漫画を担当するのは、週刊少年ジャンプにて「レディ・ジャスティス」を連載していた、荻野ケン！ド迫力のバトルアクションと、怒涛のギャグ！　魂のこもったキャラが縦横無尽に活躍する漫画版をお楽しみください！！　『冒険者になるのはできるだけ若いうちがいい』しかしその男、なんと30歳を過ぎてから冒険者を目指したリック・グラディアートルは、新米ながら最高位[Ｓランク]並みの戦闘力を有していた。　伝説のパーティ「オリハルコン・フィスト」──ドラゴンからヴァンパイアまで、文字通り「モンスター」級の師匠たちに鍛え上げられた戦闘力でなめてかかってくるエリート冒険者を次々にねじ伏せていく。「出遅れ…？何歳から冒険者やったって何歳から新しいこと始めたって…いいだろ！」

description.en:
A few years before the beginning of the story, certain girls and women all over the world began to manifest a power known as "Dreams of Alice," with which they can make select elements of their imaginations come true. The world powers are split into two factions: those who wish to keep these girls a secret and experiment on them, and those who wish to reveal their existence to the public and integrate them into society.  
  
One such girl, who's been nicknamed "The Red Queen" due to her incredibly powerful Dream of Alice, escapes from the research facility holding her and sets out to explore the outside world. Eventually, she winds up meeting a florist named Zouroku: a strict old man whose catchphrase is, "I hate crooked dealings!"  
  
(Source: MU)  
  
See [AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=19024) for the anime.

Pixiv Raw Official [Manga](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/3285) for the Official Raw

The story of a dog, Ponta, and his walker, Rieko.

---
**Support the author's:**
- [Social Media and Shop](https://potofu.me/rikirosso)

Rokuro Enmado is from a family of exorcists who remove evil Kegare, but his real dream is to be a singer, a soccer player, or anything other than an exorcist. When another exorcist, a girl named Benio Adashino arrives, Rokura is suddenly inflamed with competitive spirit and decides to put his natural knack to good use. Their rivalry gets more complicated when they both learn they are the destined "Twin Star Exorcists," two ultimate fighters fated to marry and create the prophesied child who will eliminate all the Kegare in the world.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Twin Star Exorcists** (2019)
description.ru: С давних времён доблестные оммёдзи сражаются со скверной - злобными духами, рождёнными из человеческих страхов, боли и отчаяния. Рокуро с детства мечтал стать сильнейшим оммёдзи и очистить мир от скверны, но ужасная трагедия на долгие годы убила в нём всякое желание бороться. Но кому есть дело до желаний гиперактивного мальчишки, когда от него и талантливой девочки зависит судьба всего мира?
description.tr: Rokuro Enmado, kötü Kegare'yi ortadan kaldıran bir şeytan kovucu ailesindendir, ancak asıl hayali bir şarkıcı, futbolcu ya da şeytan kovucudan başka bir şey olmaktır. Benio Adashino adında başka bir şeytan çıkarıcı kız geldiğinde, Rokura aniden rekabetçi bir ruhla alevlenir ve doğal yeteneğini iyi bir şekilde kullanmaya karar verir. İkisi de kaderlerinde evlenip dünyadaki tüm Kegare'leri ortadan kaldıracak kehanet çocuğunu yaratmak olan iki nihai savaşçı, "İkiz Yıldız Şeytan Kovucu" olduklarını öğrendiklerinde rekabetleri daha da karmaşık bir hal alır.
description.pt-br: Rokuro sonha em se tornar tudo menos um exorcista! Então a misteriosa Benio aparece. Os dois são apelidados de "Exorcistas das Estrelas Gêmeas" e descobrem que estão destinados a se casar... Rokuro pode escapar de ambos os destinos? Quando o melhor amigo de Rokuro, Ryogo, desaparece, Rokuro é forçado a pedir ajuda a Benio para entrar em Magano, o reino dos Kegare, para resgatá-lo!

title.en: I Have Nine Quadrillion Simp Gold Coins

altTitles.vi: Ta Có 90 Tỷ Tiền Liếm Cẩu!

altTitles.en: I Have 90 Billion Licking Gold Coins

description.en: Down-and-out university student Chen Yuan, devotedly pursues Goddess Lin Shutong for three years, gets kicked in the face. In his grief, he accidentally activates the “Licking Dog System” with a memory of 90 trillion Licking Dog Money, solely for licking women. The more you spend, the more you get back, and you can also obtain various attribute bonuses, transforming into a little superhero. It's called the Licking Dog System, but do I really want to be a licking dog? As long as I lick enough, I'll be the king. As long as I prove my love with enough money, I can turn the goddess into my licking dog! At this moment, Chen Yuan, who has undergone a great awakening, embarks on his life as a rich and licking dog.
Extra short comics and art related to Wagamama Kouhai-kun posted on the author's Twitter/X (@nolatanuki).

Having suffered several setbacks in her attempt to be a voice actor, Chi Yu no longer dares to bring up her hobby of dubbing in front of others. Instead, she covertly tunes in to voice drama broadcasts on Lily Radio. One day, during a public lecture at her university, she discovers that Yu Chen from the neighboring college shares a strikingly similar voice to the host of Lily Radio.

altTitles.ru: Приди же в Мир Демонов, Ирума-кун!

altTitles.th: อิรุมะคุงกับโรงเรียนปิศาจ

altTitles.ja: 魔入りました！入間くん

altTitles.id: Selamat datang di sekolah iblis! Iruma-kun

description.en:
Iruma Suzuki, fourteen years old, can’t say no to any request. His irresponsible parents make him work dangerous job after dangerous job to support them, and then one day they sell him to a demon! But, much to his surprise, the demon wants to adopt Iruma as his grandson? Unable to refuse his request, Iruma becomes the grandson of the great demon Sullivan. His new doting demon grandfather enrolls him in Demon School Babyls – where Sullivan is coincidentally the principal. Thus begins Iruma-kun's extraordinary school life among the otherworldly, meeting many colorful demons, taking on daunting challenges, and facing his true self as he rises to become someone great. 

Cozy magical slice of life with occasional urban terrorism.
description.es:
Con una vida bastante desgraciada y unos padres vagos y avaros, Iruma es arrastrado al infierno contra su voluntad después de que estos lo vendan a un demonio. Pero para su sorpresa, la vida que le depara el inframundo es mucho mejor que la que tenía con su familia.

Bajo la tutela de su nuevo dueño, un poderoso, pero solitario demonio que sólo quería cumplir su anhelo de tener un nieto, empieza a asistir a un instituto del que este es director después de firmar cierto contrato con él.

Ahora, Iruma tiene que intentar adaptarse al mundo de los demonios mientras esconde su naturaleza humana y se enfrenta a los distintos desafíos que lo esperan en su nuevo instituto. ¡Su nueva vida demoníaca acaba de empezar!
description.ru: Четырнадцатилетний Судзуки Ирума только что был брошен и продан демону его безответственными родителями! Тем не менее, к своему удивлению, он оказывается теперь живет с демоном, как его приёмный внук. Затем он поступил в школу, где его дед — Салливан, работает в качестве директора. Так начинается необычайная школьная жизнь Ирумы-куна среди потусторонних, встречая много красочных лиц, принимая на себя сложные задачи, и сталкиваясь со своим истинным — я, когда он поднимается, чтобы стать кем-то великим. Уютная волшебная повседневность с случайным городским терроризмом.
description.tr: On dört yaşındaki Iruma Suzuki hiçbir isteğe hayır diyemez. Sorumsuz ailesi, onları geçinmek için onu tehlikeli işlerden tehlikeli işlere koşturtur ve sonra bir gün onu bir iblise satarlar! Ancak iblis, Iruma'yı torunu olarak evlat edinmek isteyince çok şaşırır. Bu isteği reddedemeyen Iruma, büyük iblis Sullivan'ın torunu olur. Yeni sevecen iblis dedesi onu, Sullivan'ın tesadüfen müdürü olduğu İblis Okulu Babyls'e kaydettirir. Böylece Iruma-kun'un diğer dünyadakiler arasındaki sıra dışı okul hayatı başlar; birçok renkli iblisle tanışır, zorlu mücadelelere atılır ve büyük biri olmak için yükselirken gerçek benliğiyle yüzleşir.
description.vi: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun là câu chuyện kể về cậu bé Suzuki Iruma, người đã bị bố mẹ mình kí khế ước bán cho ác ma để đổi lấy tiền tài và bình an. Cậu bé Iruma đáng thương từ lúc mới biết đi (1 tuổi) đã phải "ra xã hội" lăn lộn, buôn ba khắp nơi với hai vị phụ huynh "tưng tửng" cho đến ngày một Ác Ma đến rước cậu đến Ma giới theo khế ước. Tưởng chừng như sắp vào bụng quỷ thì vị Ác Ma già nua này đã khóc lóc yêu cầu cậu làm cháu trai ông ta, với bản tính lương thiện và tốt bụng đến cả bản thân mình cũng phải kinh ngạc, cậu bất đắc dĩ đã đồng ý lời đề nghị đó và nhập học trường Ác Ma theo ý ông ta. Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo, mời các bạn theo dõi cuộc sống học đường đầy bất thường của Iruma-kun.
description.pt-br:
Iruma Suzuki, de quatorze anos, não pode dizer não a nenhum pedido. Seus pais irresponsáveis ​​o fazem trabalhar em empregos perigosos para sustentá-los, e então um dia eles o vendem para um demônio! Mas, para sua surpresa, o demônio quer adotar Iruma como seu neto?  

Incapaz de recusar seu pedido, Iruma torna-se neto do grande demônio Sullivan. Seu novo avô demônio amoroso o matricula na Demon School Babyls - onde Sullivan é coincidentemente o diretor. Assim começa a extraordinária vida escolar de Iruma-kun entre o outro mundo, encontrando muitos demônios coloridos, enfrentando desafios assustadores e enfrentando seu verdadeiro eu enquanto ele se torna alguém grande.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 44. ]
[ 2° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 11, Cap 94. ]
[ 3° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 17, metade do Cap 147.]

description.en:
The first ecchi in history.

Beginning in the first issue of Weekly Shonen Jump (ch 2). The nature of the content is very extreme with both teachers and students being involved in perverted situations. Over the publication, Go Nagai included more extreme content at the encouragement of his editor. As the manga continued its serialization, it garnered more and more controversy from parents. As a result, the Jump Editorial Dept. decided to cancel the serial. 

Nagai, in response to the controversy, decided to end off the manga [End of part 1] with the very infamous "Harenchi War" (Shameless War) arc.

_(spoiler)
The arc kills off the majority of the cast in a very gory and disturbing manner and remains a very infamous arc to this day._


Shameless School is controversial in Japan even today and is regarded as a "traumatic work" by several news publications.

The manga consists of 3 parts, with the last left unfinished due to the cancellation. + last volume includes 3 chapters backstory arc for Bearded Godzilla.

altTitles.ja: Holoearth Chronicles Side:E ヤマト神想怪異譚

altTitles.id: Holoearth Chronicles Side:E - Kisah Fantasi Yamato

altTitles.ja-ro: Holoearth Chronicles Side:E Yamato Kasou Kai Itan

description.en:
Come enter the world of hololive Alternative, an alternate universe fantasy project starring your favorite hololive VTubers!

This story has been lovingly brought to life by manga artist and hololive superfan Kurose Kousuke, of Goblin Slayer fame!

In the land of Yamato, humans live alongside kami. In the mountains near the city of Miyako sits Shirakami Shrine, where a certain kami has taken up residence and named herself acting priestess...
description.id:
Para Vtuber hololive beraksi di dunia fantasi dalam proyek karya dunia lain HOLOLIVE ALTERNATIVE.
Latar dunianya dikomikalisasi oleh Kurose Kousuke, seorang penggemar berat hololive yang juga dikenal sebagai orang yang menggambar komik "Goblin Slayer"!

Yamato, sebuah dunia tempat dewa dan manusia hidup bersama.
Ada suatu dewa yang tinggal di Kuil Shirakami, kuil yang lokasinya terletak agak jauh dari Kyo-no-Miyako.
Ia menyebut dirinya gadis kuil dan melindungi desa-desa dari Kegare.
description.ja:
「ホロライブ」のVTuber達が
ファンタジー世界で大活躍!!

「ホロライブ」のVTuberたちがファンタジー世界で活躍する、異世界創造プロジェクト「ホロライブ・オルタナティブ」。
その世界観を「ホロライブ」の熱烈なファンである、「ゴブリンスレイヤー」の黒瀬浩介がコミカライズ!!

カミとヒトが共に生きる世界「ヤマト」。
ミヤコから少し離れた山々の中にある「シラカミ神社」にはとあるカミが住み着き、巫女代行を名乗って村々をケガレから守っていた……。

description.en: Jiang Bei accidentally travels to the Starfall Continent and acquires a cultivation system that uses anger points as a source of power. To survive and enhance his strength, Jiang Bei engages in reckless behavior daily to accumulate anger points. His brother Jiang Nan's arrival introduces him to the world of cultivators. However, an unexpected incident reveals the identity of his mother as a witch, prompting Jiang Bei to embark on a journey to rescue his mother trapped in the Demon Realm.

One day, the entirety of the Earth was suddenly reborn into a parallel universe, and everything outside of the planet became known as "the other space". In that parallel universe, there is a three-person group that operates a general store called the "This-and-That Shop", where they spendidly solve the requests and cases that people in trouble bring to them!

altTitles.ja: こまえーきイチャイチャ漫画

title.en: Ochame na Okusan to no Nichijou Chabangoto

altTitles.en: The State of a Certain Wife

altTitles.ja: お茶目な奥さんとの日常茶番事

altTitles.ja-ro: Ochame na Okusan to no Nichijou Chabangoto

description.en:
**Links:**
- Alternate Official Raw - [X (Formerly Twitter)](https://x.com/gibagibagiba/status/1633031267829817344) (Chapter 2),
[Nico Nico Douga Manga](https://sp.manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/63088) (Different chapter numbering)
- Defunct Official Raw (Chapter 1) - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/105860251), [FANBOX](https://gibagibagiba.fanbox.cc/posts/5412957)

altTitles.en: You Have to Kill to Survive
You Have to Kill to Live

description.en:
Terminally-ill reincarnators are resurrected with a limited lifespan after death. They gain unique powers that transcend human capabilities, allowing them to steal other people's lifespans.

Twenty-one years ago, the most malevolent reincarnator vanished after killing 144 people and taking everything from me.

Thus began my 20-year quest for revenge.
description.ko:
사망 후 시한부의 수명을 가진 채 부활하는 시한부활자는 인간을 초월하는 고유의 능력을 얻게 되고, 그 능력으로 타인의 수명을 빼앗을 수 있다. 
21년 전, 144명을 죽이고 모든 것을 앗아간 후 종적을 감췄던 최악의 부활자를 잡기 위해 20년을 준비한 복수가 시작된다.

title.en: When My Organs Awakened, I Suddenly Became Invincible

altTitles.en: My Organs Awakened and I Suddenly Became Invincible

altTitles.zh: 器官觉醒，我突然无敌了

description.en: After transmigrating, Ye Qing discovered that his organs could cultivate themselves under certain conditions, and sometimes they even had their own thoughts. With the help of these overly independent organs, Ye Qing advanced rapidly on his cultivation journey. While others were busy cultivating, comprehending, and breaking through, his organs had already paved the way for him. However, because his organs had too many of their own ideas, Ye Qing frequently encountered some 'small' troubles.

altTitles.ja: ねこに転生したおじさん

altTitles.en: The Old Man Who Was Reincarnated as a Cat

description.en: An old man was hit by a truck and found himself reincarnated as a cat.

altTitles.ja: しゅがー・みーつ・がーる！

description.en:
A Sweet and Juicy Girls' Comedy~

Featuring:

Sato Kanna, daughter of a yakuza boss, she's known for being loyal to her friends and her slightly delinquent appearance.

And Mochizuki Mito, class president and the school's most envied upon young lady.

Just what unexpected secrets did these two girls found out about each other!?

Controlling the Queendom of Sevek’s female prison with the Power of the Kraken!

From the author of Akame ga Kill and Mato Seihei no Slave!
description.id: Shimizu Kuuma, seorang laki-laki, yang baru saja kembali dari wawancara kerja yang tidak bisa dia selesaikan, tiba-tiba dikirim ke dunia lain, di sana dia bertemu dengan seorang gadis tertentu yang membantunya dan memberinya pekerjaan di penjara tetapi yang tidak dia ketahui adalah bahwa ini hanya jebakan untuk membawanya dan agar dia bisa 'dinikmati' oleh Bosnya, kemudian setelah dia dibantai dan dibuang ke laut dan hampir mati dia diselamatkan oleh Kraken yang menceritakan kisahnya tentang bagaimana Dia diselamatkan oleh seorang gadis tertentu yang adalah seorang tahanan, jadi mereka membuat kesepakatan, kemudian dia menyelamatkan gadis itu dan melakukan Pembalasan.
description.es-la: Shimizu Kuuma es un chico que siempre devuelve los favores. Un día, al regresar de una entrevista de trabajo fallida, es repentinamente transportado a otro mundo. En este mundo es salvado por una chica, quien le ofrece un trabajo como guardia de una prisión de mujeres. Sin pensarlo dos veces, Kuuma acepta, pero no se imaginó, que sería casi asesinado por una prisionera. Ellas tiran su cuerpo al mar, pero antes de morir, la criatura más fuerte del mar, el Kraken, lo salva y le ofrece fusionarse con él a cambio de algo. Es así como Kuuma sobrevive, consigue los poderes del Kraken y está dispuesto a tomar el control de la prisión para devolverle el favor al Kraken.

description.en: Karin, a new employee who worked at an unethical recruiting magazine production company for half a year, was wrecked both physically and mentally. One day, Yui-san, her senior and a health nerd, gave her a massage to relax her body. In return, Yui asked Karin to hug her to warm her body up.
description.ja:
ブラックな求人誌制作会社で、日々心と体を蝕まれる入社半年の新人・夏鈴
。ある日先輩で健康オタクの癒衣さんに、体をほぐすマッサージをしてもらうことになるが、その代わりに、癒衣さんの冷え性を良くするためハグをしてほしいと頼まれて…!?

疲れている全ての現代人に贈る、ほぐし＆癒し百合4コマ！

description.en: Following an unfortunately timed case of the mumps, Hana Ichinose misses all of her high school entrance exams and ends up having to spend a gap year as a ronin. Moving to a new location and starting high school a year late, Hana becomes friends with her classmates, Eiko, Tama, and Kamuri, while keeping it a secret that she is a year older than them.

In the deep regions of the Touhouku area, the comedic story of the miko of bears, 14-year-old Machi, and her childhood friend, the talking bear Natsu, takes place as Machi struggles to qualify for city-life with Natsu's assistance.

altTitles.ja: はぐれ人魚のディアナ

description.en: A certain country long ago. A rare mermaid with transformed legs was brought to the castle, supposed to be presented to the king of a neighbouring country... But the prince who saw her suddenly said, "Would you like to be my princess?" A communal life starts from there! How will the love of these two people go?
description.ja:
昔々のとある国。一匹の人魚が城につれてこられた。脚が二股に分かれたその珍しい人魚は、隣国の王に贈呈される予定だという…だが、その人魚を見た王子は言った。「お前、俺の妃にならないか！」

そこから始まるまさかの共同生活！二人（匹）の恋の行方はいかに――！？
description.pt-br: Era uma vez, em um certo país. Uma sereia foi levada ao castelo. A estranha sereia com duas pernas iria ser entregue ao rei de um país vizinho... Mas quando o príncipe a viu, disse: "Você! Quer ser a minha princesa?!" E assim começa uma inesperada vida em comum! Como se amarão os dois (animais)? Uma comédia de amor de conto de fadas sobre duas pessoas que estão apaixonadas, começando, começando...

altTitles.ja: クールな同級生の◯◯年後...

altTitles.en: The Cool Classmate XX Years Later...

description.en: Zig—a tall, broad-shouldered mercenary—participates in a witch hunt. Following a fierce duel with the deadly witch, he becomes privy to her desire. “I want you to protect me,” she requests, tired of having her life trivialized. Seeking a place to survive, the witch and the mercenary set their sights on an unknown continent!
description.es-la: Zig, un mercenario alto y de anchos hombros, participa en una caza de brujas. Tras un feroz duelo con la mortífera bruja, se entera de su deseo. "Quiero que me protejas", le pide ella, cansada de que trivialicen su vida. En busca de un lugar donde sobrevivir, la bruja y el mercenario ponen sus miras en un continente desconocido.

altTitles.en: How to train your brainrot girlfriend

altTitles.es-la: Tengo una novia con la percepción de la realidad alterada

altTitles.tl: Paano sanayin ang iyong jowang utak-bulok

altTitles.vi: Bạn gái bại não của tôi

description.en: Brainrot Girlfriend

altTitles.ja: わたしの隣のヤンデレくん

description.en:
"My kouhai Kishi-kun appears to be my stalker."
Rika, who works at a production company, is troubled by the presence of her kouhai, Kishi, who seems to hold an abnormal adoration for her.
At the office, he's always looking at her from behind, he notices even the smallest changes, and on top of all that he also turns out to live next door?!
He cares so much about Rika that he can't stop acting in mysterious ways that barely cross the line...! Yandere office love!
Kuruma Suuna, a gloomy and socially awkward girl, begins her high school dorm life only to discover her new roommate, Hamanasu Ruka, flirting with another girl!

title.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

description.en:
A story about a ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

Jin Daim, who was being bullied by delinquents, encounters a game on his old phone that changes his life. A fraudulent strategic RPG game where you can boss around the delinquents and recruit benevolent helpers to grow stronger! The ultimate goal of this RPG game is to eliminate school violence from the world.

Ryoma Echizen just joined the Seishun Academy's tennis team, which is known for being one of the most competitive teams in Japan. Its members are incredibly talented, gifted, and athletic. With rigorous and extremely intense practices, the upperclassmen of the team expect the very best from themselves and they expect even more from the new members of the team. While most of the freshmen are on pins and needles hoping they won't get cut from the team, Ryoma Echizen is confident, cool, and collected. Some might even say he's cocky, but at least he's got the skills to back up his attitude. With his virtually unreturnable "twist serve," Ryoma is sure to make the starting team.  
  
Join Ryoma and the other first years, as they train hard, make friends, and try to find a place for themselves on the team. Ryoma Echizen is the Prince of Tennis. He may be ready for the Seishun Academy tennis team, but are THEY ready for HIM?

altTitles.ja: 絶滅寸前動物ハッチンパモス

description.en:
The Hacchin-Pamos is a critically-endangered species. Let's find out why.

A daily comic series from Q-Rais.

Ume Sasaki, a senior in high school, is helping out at her great-grandmother's ryokan during this summer vacation. She goes to the ryokan in hopes of getting some hints about her future...? This is the brightest and most dazzling "memory (memoir)" of the girls.
description.ja:
高校最後の夏休み、ひいばあちゃんが営む旅館「花瀧屋」の手伝いにやってきた佐々木梅。
到着したその夜、梅は露天風呂で滑って、湯船に落ちてしまう。
引っ張り上げてくれたのは…〝ねえさま〟と呼んでくる不思議な少女・藤野だった。

いつもと変わらない花瀧屋。
だけど、炭を使った見知らぬ暖房器具があったり、そもそも季節が夏から冬になっていたり。
これって、もしかして…〝タイムスリップ〟？

時代を越え、少女たちの一途な思いが交差する青春冒険譚、第1巻。

title.en: Kuroko no Basket - Mada Kimi ni Ai ni Iku yo (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: ヤンキーJKクズハナちゃん

altTitles.pt-br: Garota Delinquente Do Ensino Médio KuzuHana-chan

description.en:
At the beginning of the academic year, Saotome Hodaka enrolls into Moteshiro Prefectural High School, a former all-girls school that had recently integrated, but discovers it has a male to female ratio of 1:359! 

While most might think of this as a paradise, the majority of the students are delinquents and Saotome immediately finds himself being extorted by some of the more aggressive girls. However, he is inadvertently saved by Hanako Kuzuryu, a beautiful delinquent who just wants to be left alone.

Is this the start of a new friendship? And how will Saotome's life unfold in a school full of troublesome women?
description.fr:
Au début de l'année scolaire, Saotome Hodaka intègre le lycée préfectoral de Moteshiro, ancien établissement réservé aux filles et récemment devenu mixte. Il découvre rapidement que le ratio garçons/filles est de 1:359 !

Bien que cela puisse sembler être un paradis pour certains, la majorité des élèves sont des délinquantes, et Saotome se retrouve aussitôt extorqué par certaines des filles les plus agressives. Par chance, il est sauvé malgré lui par Hanako Kuzuryu, une belle délinquante qui aspire seulement à être laissée en paix.

Est-ce le début d'une nouvelle amitié ? Comment la vie de Saotome évoluera-t-elle dans une école pleine de filles turbulentes ?
description.ja:
男女比率1対359!!　359人の女子高生にいじられまくり!!　つらたんハーレム学園ラブコメ!!　コワかわ最強ヒロイン爆誕!!
四方八方ギャルだらけな県立茂手城高校に入学した黒一点・早乙女穂高は、ヤンキーJK・九頭竜華子にピンチを救われて…!?
description.pt-br:
Uma proporção de homem para mulher de 1:359?!

Saotome-kun é admitido em uma escola cheia de gyarus e conhece uma garota delinqüente chamada Hanako Kuzuryu.

description.en:
When vlogger meets top-of-the-industry writer, what could go wrong? Everything! Nothing has gone my way ever since meeting her.

Hu Luoluo, on the brink of having her vlogger account relinquished, is shoved into the path of scandal-ridden writer extraordinaire Song Li purely by accident. Being featured on hot topics, paired up as a couple, finally gaining traffic... Will it finally make her the greatest vlogger of all time?
description.es-la: Juntos o se hunden juntos, ¿se descubrirán mentiras sobre el amor? Están ligados por negocios, fingiendo ser pareja para contrarrestar los escándalos del escritor y lograr ser el primer lugar en el buscador.

description.en: The popular gal who was my childhood friend is secretly uploading provocative selfies!? In his quest to uncover the secret of this popular girl, high school boy Riku discovers that his own deeply hidden emotions were being observed by someone else… A sweet yet suffocatingly intense blend of youth, love, and suspense.
description.ja: 幼なじみの人気ギャルは、過激な自撮りをアップする裏アカ女子！？人気者の秘密を探ろうとする男子高校生・陸は、逆に自分の隠していた心の底を、別の誰かに覗かれていたことを知る‥‥。溺れるほどに甘く、息もできないほど苦しい、青春×愛憎サスペンス。

title.en: Global Freeze: I Created an Apocalypse Shelter

altTitles.zh: Quan Qiu Bing Feng: Wo Dazaole Mori Anquan Wu

altTitles.en: Freezing The World: I Built A Doomsday Safehouse

altTitles.zh: Quán Qiú Bīng Fēng: Wǒ Dǎzàole Mòrì Ānquán Wū

altTitles.en: The World Is Frozen: I Built a Doomsday Safe House

altTitles.zh: 全球冰封: 我打造了末日安全屋

description.en:
The world is plunged into an icy age, and 95% of humanity is wiped out! In his previous life, our hero Zhang Yi was tragically killed by the very people he helped, thanks to his kind heart.

But fear not, for Zhang Yi has been reborn and now possesses the awesome power – space manipulation! He's gone completely bonkers hoarding supplies for the icy apocalypse and is ready to rule the frozen wasteland! He vows to unleash a hundred times the pain on those who harmed him in the past!
description.pt-br: O mundo mergulhou numa era gelada e 95% da humanidade foi exterminada! Em sua vida anterior, nosso herói Zhang Yi foi tragicamente morto pelas mesmas pessoas que ajudou, graças ao seu bom coração. Mas não tema, pois Zhang Yi renasceu e agora possui o incrível poder de manipulação do espaço! Ele ficou completamente maluco acumulando suprimentos para o apocalipse gelado e está pronto para governar o deserto congelado! Ele promete desencadear cem vezes mais dor naqueles que o prejudicaram no passado!

title.en: 86 -Eighty Six- Mahou Shoujo Regina ☆ Lena ~Tatakae! Ginga Koukou Senkan San Magnolia~

altTitles.ja: ８６―エイティシックス― 魔法少女レジーナ☆レーナ ～戦え！銀河航行戦艦サンマグノリア～

altTitles.en: 86 -Eighty Six- Magical Girl Regina ☆ Lena ~Fight! Galactic Cruise Battleship San Magnolia~

description.en: A new "86 -Eighty Six-" series spin-off set on the stage of the "Galactic Navigating Battleship San Magnolia"! To protect that ship and its people from their enemy, an army known as the Legion, the Handlers (Magical Girls) along with their partners the Eighty-Six (Guardian Spirits) run through the cosmos!And so, the battle of the Magical Girl Lena is about to begin...!

Arata Natsume works at a child guidance center, is in his thirties and single with no plans for marriage. But one day, he receives a request from the child he was in charge of, Takuto, to "meet the criminal who killed his father". That serial killer is Shinagawa Shinju, also known as the "Shinagawa Pierrot".
description.fr: “Le clown de Shinagawa” avait défrayé la chronique lors de son arrestation : cette tueuse en série corpulente, déguisée en clown, avait découpé et caché les corps de ses victimes… Pour aider l'enfant d'une victime à retrouver la tête de son père, Arata Natsume, assistant social, va la rencontrer. Mais contre toute attente, une frêle et fragile jeune fille arrive en face de lui. Est-elle vraiment un monstre sanguinaire ? Pour le savoir, Arata va devoir se livrer à un jeu dangereux en se prétendant amoureux d'elle…
description.pt: Natsume trabalha no conselho tutelar, está em seus trinta anos e solteiro, sem planos para casa. Mas um dia, ele recebe um pedido de uma criança a qual estava a cargo, de "encontrar o criminoso que matou seu pai". Tal assassino é a serial killer Shinagawa Shinu, também conhecida como "Pierrot Shinagawa".
description.es-la: Arata Natsume trabaja en un centro de orientación infantil, tiene más de treinta años y está soltero sin planes de matrimonio. Pero un día recibe una petición del niño que tenía a su cargo, Takuto, para "conocer al criminal que mató a su padre". Ese asesino en serie es Shinagawa Shinju, también conocido como el "Shinagawa Pierrot".

description.en: Born to a mother who was sealed in a mysterious ark with ten longevity on it, Arachi, who has tremendous power, hides her power and is now the wife of HS group and an ordinary housewife. While leaving for Gangwon-do with her family, they got hit by a truck and her two sons Soo-hyuk and Seon-mi were seriously injured and lost consciousness. In order to protect her precious family, Arachi borrows the status of Sunmi, instead of Hwang Shin-hye, and awakens her past power to find the person behind the attack. Arachi, she’s coming out into the world!

title.en: Tsurenai Hodo Aokute Azatoi Kurai ni Akai

altTitles.ja: つれないほど青くて あざといくらいに赤い

altTitles.vi: Xanh đến nỗi Lạnh Lùng, Đỏ tới mức Xảo Quyệt

description.en: Is this senior... female? Male? Neutral? Demonic? A transfer student suffering from an incurable disease called curiosity meets a mysterious being (human) who is beautiful, cute, cool, and terrifying. The first of a new generation of horror comic authors presents an abyssal love story, a ghost story to peek into and sensuality to you.
description.ru:
Мой сэмпай... Кто же это? Девушка? Парень? Оно? Демон?.. Главный герой — переведенный ученик старшей школы, страдающий неизлечимым чувством любопытства натыкается на красивое, милое, крутое и опасное создание (человека?). С этого момента и начинаются их необычные отношения.

(Source: mangalib)
description.vi: Liệu senpai này là... Nữ giới? Nam giới? Vô giới? Ác quỷ giới?? Một học sinh chuyển trường mắc một căn bệnh vô phương cứu chữa gọi là sự hiếu kì đã gặp phải một tồn tại bí ẩn dưới hình dạng của một con người vô cùng xinh đẹp và dễ thương nhưng cũng rất lạnh lùng và đáng sợ. Một câu chuyện tình yêu nơi vực thẳm, một câu chuyện ma quái đầy gợi cảm, mang đến cho bạn bởi tác giả đứng đầu về một thế hệ mới của truyện kinh dị...!

description.en:
The 72 Demon Kings, who received the order to destroy the earth, each went through a trial by the Great Demon King Astrea. Those who passed the trial earned the title of Demon King, and each Demon King was granted special powers by the Great Demon King.

So far, each Demon King had been granted extraordinary abilities. When Karos became a Demon King, he received a power from the Great Demon King, but… 

“Great Demon King, no matter how much I think about it, there is a problem with my power.”
“Problem?”

Among the Demon Kings with extraordinary abilities… Karos received the [Gacha] ability. 

“Gacha as the power of a Demon King? How am I supposed to rule the world with Gacha?!'”

altTitles.ja: 自信過剰自信家ボーイッシュちゃん

description.en: And Glasses.

altTitles.en: Elves are Waiting for the Night

altTitles.ja: 四姉妹は夜をおまちかね

altTitles.zh-hk: 精靈四姐妹夜夜待笙歌

altTitles.ja: 四姉妹（エルフ）は夜をおまちかね

altTitles.en: The Four Sisters (Elves) Wait For The Night

description.en: Who will you “play” with tonight—? A sweet and sugary harem romantic comedy about sleeping with elves ♡

Furutto is a cat that leads a double life. On one hand, he's the companion of a young woman in an apartment building named Kujirai, who feeds him (when she hasn't gambled away her meager manga-assistant's paycheck) and spends time with him in her apartment. On the other hand, he wants to keep his street cred as a stray cat and spends a good amount of time hanging out with the other strays, trying to steal food out of trash cans and rumbling with the cats from the next town over.
